statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity < 50 AND category = 'Clothing';
SELECT product_id, category FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity >= 10 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE quantity > 20 ORDER BY category, product_name
SELECT product_id, price, category FROM products WHERE category LIKE 'Home%' ORDER BY product_id
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_sold FROM products JOIN transactions ON products.product_id = transactions.product_id GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sold DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM products;
SELECT transaction_date, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_date ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT id, name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT id, buyer, seller, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE seller='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, price, description FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY id;
SELECT name, price, category FROM products WHERE price < 50 AND category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, buyer, seller, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM products WHERE category IN ('Furniture', 'Home Decor') OR price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY category, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE price <= 50.00;
SELECT * FROM farmers WHERE location = 'California' OR location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT buyer_name, location, phone_number FROM buyers ORDER BY buyer_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE farmer_id = 1 AND price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT buyer_name, location FROM buyers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY buyer_name ASC;
SELECT products.product_name, farmers.farmer_name FROM products JOIN farmers ON products.farmer_id = farmers.farmer_id WHERE products.product_id = 3;
SELECT buyer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM buyers JOIN transactions ON buyers.buyer_id = transactions.buyer_id GROUP BY buyers.buyer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_id, name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity <= 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT seller_id, name, email FROM sellers WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, p.name, s.name AS seller_name, t.buyer, t.quantity, t.total_price FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id JOIN sellers s ON t.seller_id = s.seller_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT name, description, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT p.name, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id
SELECT s.name AS seller, t.total_price AS price, t.transaction_date FROM sellers s JOIN transactions t ON s.seller_id = t.seller_id WHERE t.total_price < 500
SELECT p.name AS product, SUM(pc.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
